body.p:
Paris Ky
June 20th 1865
His Excel Gov. Bramlett
D Sir

Two young men John Scott, & Joseph Chrisman, raised in the County of Jessamine and belongin to two of the most respectable familys in the County are indicted in the County of Jessamine for Mule stealing, I have known boath of them from ther infancy, thay are mear boys, and I have now no doubt that at the time the offence was commited thay ware boath under
the influence of liquor and induced to commit the act, by artfull and disorderly men, and made dupes off
Thay have boath sustained good caracters upto this occurance, and now much regrett their folly, I believe if thay are pardoned, thay will reform their lives and make good and usefull citizens.
I therefore make and aske your Ecelencey to pardon ther offence and restore them to their distinguished families, I believe it will be approved by all that know the facts, Yours truly
